name: aws-lambda-edge-starter-kit
description: Kameleoon Starter Kit for running edge compute experiments on AWS Lambda@Edge.

scripts.test:viewer-request: npm run build -- --environment TEST && sam local invoke -e ./lambda/viewer_request.json KameleoonLambdaFunction
scripts.test:viewer-response: npm run build -- --environment TEST && sam local invoke -e ./lambda/viewer_response.json KameleoonLambdaFunction
scripts.test:origin-request: npm run build -- --environment TEST && sam local invoke -e ./lambda/origin_request.json KameleoonLambdaFunction
scripts.test:origin-response: npm run build -- --environment TEST && sam local invoke -e ./lambda/origin_response.json KameleoonLambdaFunction
